issue.title: [CI] Nightly builds can't upload gir1.2-gandiva-1.0_3.1.0.dev841-1_amd64.deb
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12784](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12784). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
gir1.2-gandiva-1.0_3.1.0.dev841-1_amd64.deb returns a 403 error for github-ubuntu-focal-amd64
